2022 has been a special year for Porsche.
A year full of emotion, excitement and making new friends.
All over the world, our community has grown stronger,...
...and while we've celebrated those with courage and a hunger for adventure,...
...there's always the odd bump in the road.
Thankfully, drive, determination, and ambition always win through.
We've been guided by our dreams,...
...as we broke records, launched a successful IPO, brought virtual reality to life.
And we did all of this together.
Because without you, none of this would have been possible.
